arts.ttl: Cifuentes hails QPR matchwinner Dunne following Preston victory
arts.sum: While keen to praise all of his players following the 2-1 victory against Preston North End, QPR head coach Marti Cifuentes was particularly pleased for defender Jimmy Dunne. Dunne headed in a late Ilias Chair cross to win the game against North End and help Rangers move seven points clear of the Championship relegation zone.

arts.ttl: QPR boss Cifuentes declares Preston win ‘best performance’ of the season
arts.sum: “Even against Norwich [in the recent 3-0 win] we had a stronger result, for me the performance today is more complete in the way we want to play,” said Cifuentes. Today we won a game and it’s seven in a row, but the reality is the Christmas schedule is crazy and we need to be ready.”
How we rated the players. The post QPR v Preston player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Jimmy Dunne scores late winner as in-form QPR come from behind to beat Preston
arts.sum: Dunne’s 89th-minute winner came after Preston were reduced to 10 men.

arts.ttl: Dunne scores late winner for gutsy QPR
arts.sum: QPR v Preston. The post Dunne scores late winner for gutsy QPR appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Sure signs that Marti Cifuentes working his magic again to life QPR away from Championship drop danger
arts.sum: Almost a year on from that formative night, QPR again hosted Stoke at Loftus Road, but a 1-1 draw – where defeat was only avoided by the visitors having a late goal controversially disallowed – made the success of last season feel a very long time ago. Despite that draw with Stoke leaving the Loftus Road faithful having seen just 13 home wins from the previous 59 attempts, support for Cifuentes following the final whistle was significant and vocal.

arts.ttl: Queens Park Rangers vs Preston predictions: Visitors to extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: There is little to separate Queens Park Rangers and Preston in the Championship table and Joe Casey expects that to also be the case when they meet this weekend in west London.

arts.ttl: Preview: Queens Park Rangers vs. Preston North End - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Queens Park Rangers and Preston North End, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
